# The `Bitset` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is a constexpr reimplementation of a subset of std::bitset. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;unsigned NumBits&gt;
class llvm::Bitset&lt;NumBits&gt;</CodeBlock>

</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

This is a constexpr reimplementation of a subset of std::bitset.

It would be nice to use std::bitset directly, but it doesn&#39;t support constant initialization.

Definition at line 30 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/bitset-h">Bitset.h</a>.
